monster_candy.name: Monster Candy
monster_candy.description: You ate the Monster Candy. ... tastes like licorice.

spider_donut.name: Spider Donut
spider_donut.description: A donut made with Spider Cider in the batter.

spider_cider.name: Spider Cider
spider_cider.description: Made with whole spiders, not just the juice.

snowman_piece.name: Snowman Piece
snowman_piece.description: Please take this to the ends of the earth.

nice_cream.name: Nice Cream
nice_cream.description: Instead of a joke, the wrapper says something nice.

bisicle.name: Bisicle
bisicle.description: It's a two-pronged popsicle, so you can eat it twice.

unisicle.name: Unisicle
unisicle.description: It's a SINGLE-pronged popsicle. Wait, that's just normal...

cinnamon_bunny.name: Cinnamon Bunny
cinnamon_bunny.description: A Cinnamon roll in a shape of a bunny.

crab_apple.name: Crab Apple
crab_apple.description: An aquatic fruit that resembles a crustacean.

sea_tea.name: Sea Tea
sea_tea.description: Made from glowing marsh water. Increases SPEED for one battle.

sea_salt.name: Sea Salt
sea_salt.description: A pinch of salt from the sea. Increases DEFENSE for one battle.

abandoned_quiche.name: Abandoned Quiche
abandoned_quiche.description: A psychologically damaged spinach egg pie.

temmie_flakes.name: Temmie Flakes
temmie_flakes.description: It's just torn up pieces of colored construction paper.

dog_salad.name: Dog Salad
dog_salad.description: A salad made of dog food. It's not very good.

instant_noodles.description: Comes with everything you need for a quick meal!

hot_dog.name: Hot Dog...?
hot_dog.description: The "meat" is made of something called a "water sausage."

hot_cat.name: Hot Cat
hot_cat.description: Like a hot dog, but with little cat ears on the end.

junk_food.name: Junk Food
junk_food.description: Food that was probably once thrown away.

hush_puppy.name: Hush Puppy
hush_puppy.description: This wonderful spell will stop a dog from casting magic.

starfait.name: Starfait
starfait.description: A sweet treat made of sparkling stars.

glamburger.name: Glamburger
glamburger.description: A hamburger made of edible glitter and sequins.

legendary_hero.name: Legendary Hero
legendary_hero.description: Sandwich shaped like a sword. Increases ATTACK when eaten.

steak_in_the_shape_of_mettatons_face.name: Steak in the Shape of Mettaton's Face
steak_in_the_shape_of_mettatons_face.description: Huge steak in the shape of Mettaton's face. You don't feel like it's made of real meat...
